# f5xc_k8s_cluster_role (Resource)

Manages a K8sClusterRole in F5 Distributed Cloud.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the K8sClusterRole.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the K8sClusterRole will be created.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the K8sClusterRole.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels to apply to the K8sClusterRole.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the K8sClusterRole.
